name: 3 Step Brightening System
description: Scientis, an emerging leader in the science of skin discoloration, announces the launch of Cyspera® Intensive System™, a new three-product system clinically proven to improve hyperpigmentation such as persistent brown patches and dark spots. Sold at dermatologist offices nationwide without a prescription, this novel pigment corrector is the next breakthrough in the fight against stubborn hyperpigmentation. The system includes Cyspera® Intensive™, Cyspera® Neutralize™, and Cyspera® Boost™.
